title: If the Imam doesn't say Ameen after Fateha, what should the followers do? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: many do not say I mean loudly in prayer mmm and many Imams do not say it loudly so if your pray behind an imam who doesn't say I mean loudly what should be done it is it is a Sunnah so even if the imam does not say I mean you say I mean and the other worshippers say I mean as well this is the Sunnah of the Prophet Elisha Auto Salam
